channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- CLUEVO LMS, E-Learning Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- CLUEVO LMS, E-Learning Platform

item.title: CVE-2021-25029|2024-08-03T19:49:14.629Z -- unknown -- cluevo%20lms%2C%20e-learning%20platform
item.description: The CLUEVO LMS, E-Learning Platform WordPress plugin before 1.8.1 does not sanitise and escape Course's module, which could allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed
